001package io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.extension;
002
003import org.junit.jupiter.api.Order;
004import org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.BeforeTestExecutionCallback;
005import org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.ExtensionContext;
006
007import static io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.util.AllureStepHelper.initializeTestEnvironment;
008import static io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.util.AllureStepHelper.setupTestContext;
009
010/**
011 * JUnit 5 {@code BeforeTestExecutionCallback} extension that logs test execution start details.
012 *
013 * <p>This extension captures and logs the test name before execution begins,
014 * storing the start time in the test execution context for later use in reporting.
015 *
016 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
017 */
018@Order(Integer.MIN_VALUE)
019public class Prologue implements BeforeTestExecutionCallback {
020
021   /**
022    * Executes before the test method starts.
023    *
024    * <p>This method performs the following steps before executing a test:
025    * <ul>
026    *     <li>Initializes the test environment by collecting and storing configuration properties.</li>
027    *     <li>Writes environment properties and category-related data for reporting.</li>
028    *     <li>Extracts and logs the test class and method names.</li>
029    *     <li>Assigns a unique identifier to the test execution context.</li>
030    *     <li>Stores the test start time for later use in reporting.</li>
031    * </ul>
032    *
033    * @param context The test execution context containing metadata about the test.
034    */
035   @Override
036   public void beforeTestExecution(final ExtensionContext context) {
037      initializeTestEnvironment();
038      setupTestContext(context);
039   }
040
041}
